short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display random verses from the Holy Quran with translations and audio

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Random Quran Verses extension offers users a simple way to explore and reflect on the teachings of the Quran. Key features include:

• Display random verses from the Quran with just one click
• Read verses in both Arabic and English (or other selected translations)
• Listen to high-quality audio recitations of the verses
• Save favorite verses for easy access later
• Customize the app's appearance with different themes and font sizes
• Share verses easily with others

This extension is perfect for Muslims looking to incorporate more Quranic reflection into their daily lives, as well as for anyone interested in learning about Islamic teachings. It provides a quick and convenient way to access spiritual guidance, improve Arabic language skills, or simply gain exposure to the wisdom of the Quran.

The user-friendly interface and customization options make it suitable for users of all ages and backgrounds. Whether you're seeking daily inspiration, studying the Quran, or just curious about its contents, this extension offers an accessible and enriching experience right in your browser.
